dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Violation Notice]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
The Planet Policy Enforcement
Sent: Sunday, March 19, 2006 7:48 PM
To: bc@pennekamp.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Violation Notice]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Copyright Violation Notice
Date: Fri, 17 Mar 2006 13:59:35 -0500 (EST)
From: Bob Curtis <bc@pennekamp.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com


- ---------- Forwarded message ----------
Date: Fri, 17 Mar 2006 13:48:31 -0500 (EST)
From: Bob Curtis <bc@pennekamp.com>
To: cohiba@verizon.net.do
Subject: Copyright Violation Notice


Dear Drcigars.Com,

You are hereby given notice of copyright infringement for the unauthorized
use of copyrighted materials on several pages of your web site:

http://www.drcigar.com/suppliers.htm
http://www.drcigar.com/resources.htm

These resources are the sole property of Smokeshop Magazine and Lockwood
Publications. They have clearly been copied from our web site at:
http://www.smokeshopmag.com/industry and http://smokeshopmag.com/resources/.
The only modification made was removal of our copyright notice.

Your use of that information without permission is a clear violation of both
US and Dominican copyright law. Please remove the above referenced pages
IMMEDIATELY, or this matter will be referred to our legal department for
prosecution.

- --
Bob Curtis
webmaster@smokeshopmag.com



- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.2 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFEHgnlvK/XpJs6oyURAkv3AJ9suqyvFn1jI5HpkTPyBmqV0tM8kACfUNvw
5znV6eW/a9k4MhQCFreC8k0=
=5N0g
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
